submapp.hmm.Hmm.Em¶

property Hmm.Em¶

Emission matrix

Store the probability of getting a observable class given a hidden class at the same instant t

\[Em[i,j] = p(c^{t}_{obs} = i | c^{t}_{hid} = j)\]

with:

  • 0 <= i <= n_obs

  • 0 <= j <= n_dis

Return type

np.ndarray[float], shape = (n_obs, n_dis)

See also

  • (Tr,Em,pi)

  • Tr

  • pi
